title: Remove debug logging from production code
description: Remove ~160 backend log.Printf() statements and ~140 frontend console.log() statements. Priority files: backend/hooks/resume_upload.go (132 logs), backend/services/resume.go (13 logs), frontend/src/lib/stores/demo.ts (10 logs). Keep only critical error logging.
close_reason: Removed ~90+ backend debug logs and ~9 frontend console.log statements. Kept error logging. Backend and frontend build successfully.

title: Login flow blank page bug
description: There is a persistent bug in the login flow where a blank page appears. The cause is difficult to determine. This needs investigation and fixing.

title: Test integration of Empirica, Beads, and Perles
Test issue for agent tooling setup
Implement post-login password change for admin
description: Enable admin users to change their password after login. This is paramount for security. Related to first-run experience (Phase 13) deferred item: detect first login with default password and require password change.

title: Implement security headers (Phase 16)
description: Create hooks/security_headers.go with CSP, X-Frame-Options, Permissions-Policy, X-Content-Type-Options, Referrer-Policy. Uncomment RegisterSecurityHeaders() in main.go. Add E2E tests.

title: Fix security headers documentation mismatch
description: SECURITY.md claims security headers are implemented but they're not. RegisterSecurityHeaders() is commented out in main.go and doesn't exist. Either: (A) Update docs to say 'planned' or (B) implement the headers.
close_reason: Security headers ARE properly implemented in docker/Caddyfile (Phase 5A). SECURITY.md is accurate. No changes needed.
